title: As China-Taiwan Tensions Rise, Japan Begins Preparing for Possible Conflict
content:
1. As China-Taiwan Tensions Rise, Japan Begins Preparing for Possible Conflict  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Taiwan plans to spend $1.4 billion on new fighter jets amid rising China military activity  CNN
  3. Taiwan, Japan ruling parties discuss China, military cooperation  Reuters
  4. Japan Ruling Party Lawmakers Back Taiwan Joining Trade Pact  Bloomberg
  5. In a twist, China’s delay in approving BioNTech’s vaccine could help Taiwan.  The New York Times
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 中台間の緊張が高まる中、日本は紛争に備えて準備を開始
随着中国台湾紧张局势的加剧，日本开始为可能的冲突做准备
隨着中國臺灣緊張局勢的加劇，日本開始爲可能的衝突做準備
